thread.title: Arrow Strategies Announces New Vice President Of Business Development
thread.title_full: Arrow Strategies Announces New Vice President Of Business Development

author: admin
title: Arrow Strategies Announces New Vice President Of Business Development
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 5:16 AM   Arrow Strategies 
BINGHAM FARMS, Mich., Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Arrow Strategies announces the hiring of Ms. Kerry Kurowski as Vice President of Business Development. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20151022/279561 
Ms. Kurowski has twenty plus (20+) years of experience in Information Technology consulting services. She started her career in recruiting, before moving into roles of direct sales, account management, and employee support in the automotive and healthcare vertical. Her career expanded globally as the years progressed into Sales and Executive management. "Arrow Strategies presented me with a unique opportunity to be a part of a company that leads with our Agent For Life philosophy. This allows us to put our clients, consultants and community needs above the bottom line. I am ecstatic at the opportunity to be back in the business I love and with the Arrow Family," says Kerry Kurowski. 
"We are thrilled to have Kerry on our team. As we have grown over the last couple of years, it became evident that we needed to add someone with Kerry's experience to our executive team. We look forward to Kerry driving the business value that we deliver to our clients across our entire enterprise," says John Ninkovich, President of Arrow Strategies. 
Arrow Strategies is a national Talent Acquisition Solutions Firm headquartered in Bingham Farms, Michigan. Arrow Strategies has won many formal accolades recognizing their continued performance including Inc. Magazine's Fast Growing Companies for eight (8) consecutive years, 5(th) Fastest Growing Staffing Firm in the country by Staffing Industry, and Best Companies to Work For twelve (12) consecutive years. 
Contact: Kelly Chidester, Executive Assistant to President and CEO
